name: Frorbit
description:
Hi all!

This is game #4 of my Game-A-Day self isolation challenge. Took a break for a day, but back at it today!

In this game, you play as a little rolling frog who rolls around a planet collecting rings! (rings huh? sounds familiar)

31-03-2020

If you would like to play on mobile, just download the Frorbit.apk file and then install while allowing installation from an unknown source!
(It's not verified by play protect, so it'll kick up a fuss about running it)
